content.question: A circuit consists of a battery and some wire with significant resistance. The wire is bent so that the circuit is in the shape of a square, and the circuit is aligned in the plane of the page, as shown above. Which of the following best describes the direction of the magnetic field near point <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: The field has no direction because the magnitude of the field is zero.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
